updates.title: Teacher Assistant Tools
features: Real-Time Analytics: Teachers can now see live student counts.
Class Management: Create classes and generate unique access codes.
Secure Role Persistence: Improved stability for teacher accounts.
Data Isolation: Automatic cleanup on logout to protect student privacy.

updates.title: Community & Forums Update
features: New Forum Delete Button: You can now delete your own suggestions.
Soft Delete: Posts are hidden instead of permanently removed.
Legacy Post Support: You can also clean up your old ownerless posts.
Mobile Compatibility: Improved responsiveness for phones and tablets.
bugFixes: Fixed permissions for deleting forum posts.

updates.title: Immersive Sounds Update
features: New Ambience System: Added Rain, Forest, Coffee Shop, and Ocean sounds
New Sound Controls: Toggle and control volume from the floating widget
Forum Fixes: Suggestions now save reliably
improvements: Cleaned up UI: Moved sound toggles to dedicated widget
bugFixes: Fixed issue where forum posts would disappear

updates.title: Multilingual & Arcade Expansion
features: Spanish Mode (Beta): Added initial Spanish translation support across core lessons.
Algebra 2 Expansion: New lesson content and translations for advanced math.
Arcade Refinements: Improved game scaling and responsiveness.
Translation Debugger: New tools to help identify missing translation keys.
improvements: Reduced visual flash when switching languages.
Standardized navigation buttons across all quiz pages.

updates.title: Core Logic Optimization
features: Unified Game Engine: Deduplicated game logic scripts for faster loading.
Standardized Lesson Structure: Physics and Chemistry lessons now use a consistent template.
Unit Test Improvements: Fixed duplicate buttons and scoring glitches.
bugFixes: Fixed scoring bug in multi-choice quizzes.
Resolved navigation loop in Physics Unit 3.

updates.title: Algebra & Content Update
features: Algebra 1 Content Pack: Added 10+ new interactive lessons.
Geometry Flashcards: New study tools for vocabulary retention.
Language Shortcuts: Quickly toggle languages with keyboard shortcuts.
improvements: Enhanced mobile layout for course selection cards.
Updated tutorial overlays for first-time users.
